nodes.text: "Orders are orders" is the fifth in a series of comics on the LEGO Star Wars website. It debuted in late 2008 on the LEGO website and was later added to StarWars.com on October 21, 2009.
"Obi-Wan and Cody arrive on Rodia, and discover a Separatist ambush!"

The comic begins with Asajj Ventress receiving orders for a new mission from Count Dooku via hologram. It then cuts to a Republic Gunship carrying General Kenobi, Commander Cody and other clones with two V-19 Torrent starfighters approaching a planet. Obi-Wan explains that he had received orders from Supreme Chancellor Palpatine to guard this planet friendly to the Republic.
Once the LAAT/i enters the atmosphere, they find Separatist forces waiting for them on the ground, and are attacked by two Droid Gunships. The LAAT/i manages to shoot one down, while Kenobi jumps from the Republic Gunship and destroys the other with his lightsaber. Once the LAAt/i has landed, all of the clones except Cody are in the air, due to Ventress' Force Grip. Ventress then flees the area with Kenobi following her on a speeder. The two then have a lightsaber duel, until Kenobi falls and Ventress comes forward to attack, then "To Be Continued!" flashes up, and cuts to a scene where two clones (one of them Cody) and two battle droids are playing cards discussing how the duel might be going. A droid says that "someone will probably lose a hand", with a clone replying, "that does seem to happen a lot".
